You don't need to spend 500 every month. Just spend 95 in the next statement so it can be offset by cashback

There is an annual limit to the card of $12k for 5% cash back.So don‚Äôt put more than $12k spend a year on this card.Good thing is if online and hit >= $500  can get 5% cash back from it on the months that you need it.
